text.section: Upon the filing of a petition which initiates a formal court action in the interest of the child, the court-designated worker's involvement, with the exception of the activities defined in subsection (1)(i) of this section, shall cease.
When a child is to be tried as an adult, the court-designated worker need not make dispositional recommendations.
